original_title: Vacances organisées pour filles en chaleur
overview: Sex vacations in the Alpilles in the company of the very hot Angele and Mariette, two delightful kinky Provencal - maliciously interpreted by Daniele David and Carole Stresse - bursting in to encounter hot and perverted with the rooster of the village to the chagrin of two children of the village whom have become Parisians and are preparing to return, low tail, to the capital. But on the way back...
title: Sex Holiday
